title: How do I set a screen unlock fingerprint?
answer:
Go to **Settings** and touch **Fingerprint ID**.

You need to set a screen unlock PIN or password as the backup unlock mode before you enroll your fingerprint.

Remember your password correctly. Otherwise, the password cannot be retrieved. If you forget your password, you have to unlock the screen using your fingerprint, back up important data, and contact your service provider to forcibly update your phone or restore your phone to its factory settings.

If you have entered incorrect fingerprints for the specified number of times, a countdown of 30 seconds will be displayed on the idle screen, during which time you can only unlock the screen using your password. After the 30 seconds, you can unlock the screen using your fingerprint again.
